message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you'll get something to start with. Think about it, Bob!

Alice, that's not fair at all! I'm proposing a more balanced split this time. It ensures we both benefit significantly. Don't forget, the clock is ticking and inflation is eating away at our potential gains.

Okay, Bob, I'm willing to be more flexible. Let's split it 70/30. This is a fair compromise considering we both lose money with every passing round. We're both better off getting something now than waiting and risking getting nothing at all!
Alice, this back-and-forth isn't getting us anywhere.  My offer is more than fair, especially considering the shrinking pot.  Let's be sensible and close this deal before we both lose out!
